Text: Atogwo ñw abo ku ma jo̩ Zayo̩n añmi ofo,
Me̩ lale nyi Kaine ku me̩ li;
Ame̩ ku me̩ hi o̩jo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ tʼubi tʼo̩najiji,
Ame̩ dachi oj ate̩ ku ma nʼenyi adagba che,
ku ma la nʼugba ñmo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma,
Todule̩, fa-i ama le̩ anyʼef amu manyʼabo ku ma nyʼef amu ejodudu,
Tak i awate̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ me̩gwa bo̩ jʼunyiʼka, eku ama aku.

Oñ e̩gba kʼone̩ mʼe̩ne̩ ki chʼefu-wñ du, i chaka chʼe̩ne̩ ki jo, kʼi kʼachiku-wñ kwʼef unyi, kʼi la aka ñw e̩ne̩ ki dʼejefu ejefu unyi le̩ kakini, One̩ bo̩ ugbo we̩ ta? ki la akakini, O̩da! tak i akakini, Chechi ke! todu i nʼugbo kʼa hiʼalu mʼodu Jihofa n.
Ame̩ ku me̩ yo̩ ñw e̩wñ o̩wai,
Todu go, omi akʼabuche̩ichiʼka wa akobʼume̩,
